ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/reactDetox.xcworkspace -scheme reactDetox -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build --quiet

ios.sim.release.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace ios/reactDetox.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=YES -scheme reactDetox -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build --quiet
